title: Did Hype Hurt the OnePlus 9?  Is LG Done Making Phones?
description:
At long last, we finally stop talking about NFTs and get back to our bread and butter. We start by covering the possible demise of LG's mobile device business, before debating if OnePlus's Hasselblad hype may have hurt its launch of the OnePlus 9 series.  Finally, we wrap up the episode with our thoughts on Tesla accepting Bitcoin as payment for their cars.
